title: Bring your family home to this Res Lease in Austin. 3 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: WOW!!!
Private GATED COMMUNITY.
Features a SPACIOUS private yard, a phenomenal Spiral Staircase leading to the ROOF SUN DECK and an excellent walkable location.
Greeted by a majestic towering oak tree.
The home features a 2 car garage, an open concept, perfect for entertaining!
The kitchen offers ample counter space with gas appliances, a gourmet chefs delight.
The kitchen opens up into the living and dining area.
The versatile bar area leads to the LARGE fenced yard perfect for gardening or your pet.
The well designed second level offers spacious bedrooms with an exuberant amount of natural lighting.
Relax on the second floor patio by the towering oak or travel up to the third floor for sunbathing, relaxation and enjoying the great view of the surrounding area.
A phenomenal home in an excellent location.
--to set up a viewing--
